Articles.Content: I cannot get the truss structure nodes to show when trying to use fairings. I have toggled the setting in the fairing menu. Anyone else having an issue or have an answer?

Hello, @justwanttofly, and welcome to the forum!

The truss structure setting is just to show/hide the bars and plates.  To get the nodes to show, you need the interstage stages option on.  I believe advanced tweakables must be on for this.
